column4: I'm trying to get some files out of my samsung gt-s5600, when I connect the phone via USB and select mass storage the device mounts for a few seconds then disappears
bluetooth isn't an option for me and I'd like to believe that there's a more convenient way to get the files out than having a virtual windows machine
i use ssh to transfer files. but it is strange that the device disappears. check log see if you have any clue ~ and make sure the wire is firmly inserted.
